content: Is there tooling to generate language headers/stubs from a wasm module's exports? wasm-bindgen seems to go only the other direction.

The closest analog for this is the witx-bindgen tool based on interface types, is that what you're looking for? https://github.com/bytecodealliance/witx-bindgen/

GitHub - bytecodealliance/witx-bindgen: A language binding generator for `witx` (a precursor to WebAssembly interface types)
